info.title: APlus API Documentation
info.description:
# APlus API Documentation

Welcome to the APlus API. This API provides endpoints for:

- **Authentication** - User registration, login, OTP verification
- **Exams** - Browse exams, sections, subjects, and categories
- **Questions** - Search and retrieve questions with answers
- **Lessons** - Learning content and progress tracking
- **Practice Exams** - Practice test sessions
- **Payments** - Subscription and payment processing
- **Leaderboard** - Student rankings and scores

## API Versions

- **v1** - Legacy API (deprecated)
- **v2** - Current stable API (recommended)

## Authentication

Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer <your-token>
```

post.summary: Check user existence and 2FA status before login
Send OTP for 2FA login or password reset
Initiate password reset - find user and return contact options

get.summary:
Get exam details with unified structure (without questions)
GET /api/v2/exams/{exam}

Get all subjects for an exam
GET /api/v2/exams/{exam}/subjects

Get all sections for an exam
GET /api/v2/exams/{exam}/sections

enum: No exam found for this student

get.summary:
Get specific practice exam with questions
GET /api/v2/practice-exams/{practiceExam}

Get question details by ID
GET /api/v2/questions/{question}

enum: Insufficient points to view this question

get.summary: Get all settings, optionally filtered by group
Get a specific setting by key
List students ordered by newest first

delete.summary: Request deletion of a student (requires admin approval)

enum: Deletion request submitted for admin approval

post.summary: Create multiple students from JSON array

enum: Invalid period. Use: week, month, 3months, year

get.summary: Get trending courses ordered by enrollment count

order.description: Assuming Answer model has image_path logic

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
